instructions.en:
Move Mario around the factory and pull levers to open the valves. Jump on the lifts to move between the 4 hoppers. Don't fall off the lift and don't let the cement overflow.

Start the game by pressing [Game A] or [Game B].
Use [control] buttons to move left and right and [Open] to pull the levers.
You can use the keyboard cursors to move and [Z] to open.
